name: Underworld Wonderland
description:
A roguelite action romp inspired by Risk of Rain 2. You are a tourist from a future Earth, traveling to a parallel dimension where magic and myth are an everyday occurrence and nuisance. You came looking for adventure - whether as hero or villain doesn't matter. What the Institute of Dimensional Travel didn't tell you, though, is that you're never gonna be able to come home.

You will die. You will continue. You will terrorise. And you will slaughter. This world is now your playground, and you will make of it whatever you wish.

--controls--

Movement:                                            MKB: WASD               Gamepad: Left stick

Right hand primary attack:          MKB: Left mouse     Gamepad: RT

Right hand secondary attack:     MKB: E                           Gamepad: RB

Left hand primary attack:              MKB: Right mouse  Gamepad: LT

Left hand secondary attack:         MKB: Q                          Gamepad: LB

Pickup weapon right hand:            MKB: E                           Gamepad: RB

Pickup weapon left hand:               MKB: Q                          Gamepad: LB

Jump:                                                          MKB: Space                 Gamepad: A

Camera zoom in/out:                         MKB: Numpad +/-   Gamepad: D-pad up/down

Sprint toggle:                                         MKB: Left shift          Gamepad: Click left stick
